mapper.insert: insert into app_admin (id, name, age, phone, password, admin_code, admin_type, login_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_admin set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_code = #{adminCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_type = #{adminType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, age, phone, password, admin_code, admin_type, login_name from app_admin
